document:
The mailing list Please direct here anything related to the program, you don't need to be subscribed to post. The address is zapping-misc@lists.sourceforge.net. You can subscribe, search the archives, et al. here.
If you want to contact me directly, use this. But please don't use my address for general questions, bug reports, suggestions, etc., use the list instead. If you post to the mailing list you'll get an answer all the same and other people can benefit too when they look to the archives.
